data.title: Learn more about Front Range Community College
data.text:
Then & Now at FRCC

Like our students, we continue to learn and grow. In 1995, we offered our first online class, and now we offer more than 500 online courses in an average semester. We've also expanded to three campuses in Westminster, Larimer, and Boulder County. They host state-of-the-art facilities like our new Health Care Careers Center on our Larimer Campus and the Center for Integrated Manufacturing on our Boulder County campus.

At FRCC, you'll find a place where faculty and staff come together to help all students reach their education and career goals. Learn more about our supportive and collaborative community and see why more students choose FRCC than any other community college in Colorado.

A Space for Everyone

We are committed to creating an inclusive environment that promotes educational equity. FRCC students, faculty and staff work to learn from one another, embrace our differences and support a sense of belongingâ€”in our classrooms and beyond. Learn about our philosophy of inclusion and our efforts to make FRCC a place where all people belong and reach their full potential.

east Equity & Inclusion
